top_comments.comment:
A HUGE thanks to Drew and Linda Scott for helping design the interior of my new home! Go follow them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/athome. 

Would you like to see any other videos of the house? I can show whats in my fridge, pantry, Mike's Office, and more! Let me know

comments_since_last_sample.body: Sooo awesome to see that Ro has Thermador appliances because I’m getting my new kitchen with Thermador appliances next month!!
Your house is my dream house

Betty Barista 

I remember when you filmed in your tiny appointment, now look at your gorgeous home! 
Your Creativity and Work paid off well 
Congratulations on your new home! 

I’d never leave if I lived there🍿🧁💕😎👙
That island is gorgeous and great to cook in!
I thought today is helloween video but it turns to home tour video

"Got this Sage from a friend of mine, Patrick Star."

Huh, she's even got connections in Bikini Bottom...

Patrick Star Collab when?
Wow!! That is my dream house!! My house would have way more plants though hahahah
We want a Fridge Tour ASAP! 😍
Loved the video. So happy for you. Can you please do a collab with Rebecca Zamolo? huge fan of both of you for 3 years. And honestly, your house and your backyard looks so much like Rebecca's house
Hi Ro! I wish you have a amazing experience with your house! Btw... You're living my DREAMM HOMEEE!!!  Love you and your doggies!!!
i think you should name the coffee mashine brittney the brista
Also for the coffee machine I think a good name would be Francesca
I feel like you could get a custom built sliding ladder in your closet, kinda like the ones in older libraries, that way you can reach all your things ❤️ Might be a cute and helpful function
Please do an updated fridge tour! 💕
